341 
 
COURSE/DEGREE AWARDING 
INSTITUTIONS  
REQUIREMENTS    
UTME SUBJECTS  
SPECIAL CONSIDERATION (WAIVER) REMARKS  
DIRECT ENTRY  UTME  
      
UTME  
(i) LAGOS requires five (5) 'O' level credit passes in English  
Language,  Mathematics,  Biology/Health 
Science/Physical Education, and one (1) other science 
subject.  
(ii) EBSU requires five (5) 'O' levelcredit passes in English 
Language, Mathematics, Biology and any other two (2) 
subjects.  
(iii) IAUED – Same as Health and Safety Education  
(a) KWASU accepts Five (5) 'O' level credit passes in English 
Language, Mathematics, Biolog y, Chemistry and any 
other one (1)Science Subject.  
(v) KSU requires five (5) 'O' levelcredit passes in English 
Language, Mathematics and three (3)other relevant 
subjects.  
(vi) TASUED – Same as in Health Education.  
(vii) AAUA requires five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes in English 
Language, Mathematics, Biology and any other two (2) 
subjects.  
  
UTME SUBJECTS  
(i) LAGOS requires Biology and two (2) other Science 
subjects.  
(ii) IAUED – Same as Health and Safety Education.  
(iii) KWASU requires Mathematics and any other two (2) 
science subjects.  
(iv) TASUED – Same as in Health Education.
